entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is described as feeling lightheaded with amazement at his discoveries.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is standing in the tent with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is standing in the tent with Ron and holding Lily's letter.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as the sender of a letter that Hermione is holding.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is another name for You-Know-Who, who is chasing the third Deathly Hallows.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is an object that Harry holds up and says he has found.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends as they stand together in the tent.
